author: wn.com
title: UK inshore lifeboat and rescue boat charities to benefit from £1 million government grant scheme ...
text: ( Source : DFT - UK Department for Transport ) The second year of the Inshore and Inland Rescue Boat Grant scheme launched today ( 19 October 2015 ), giving voluntary rescue groups nationwide a chance to secure funding for new lifesaving
